H0.text: Which American city experienced an earthquake in the early hours of January 17th 1994. San Francisco

H1.text: Which American city experienced an earthquake in the early hours of January 17th 1994. Seattle

H2.text: Which American city experienced an earthquake in the early hours of January 17th 1994. Portland

H3.text: Which American city experienced an earthquake in the early hours of January 17th 1994. LA

A4.text: The epicenter of the 1994 Northridge earthquake was beneath the San Fernando Valley, part of Greater Los Angeles, California.

A5.text: California State University, Northridge was the closest university to the epicenter of the 1994 Northridge earthquake.
